prompts: Create a dark-type Pokemon with sharp claws and a sneaky demeanor.
I want a Pokemon that excels in stealth, featuring blue and red accents.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies agility and cunning, with a sleek body shape.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in forests and mountains, with a playful personality.
Imagine a Pokemon that can blend into urban environments, showcasing unique color patterns.
Design a Pokemon that evolves through cunning and strategy, emphasizing its dark nature.
Give me a Pokemon with a playful yet mischievous personality, perfect for adventures.
